name: Someone
description:
You are someone, in a dark room with a computer and the world inside, exposed to you through text descriptions.  You don't remember who you are or how you got here.

This is more of a story, than a game,  though light puzzle elements are planned for the walking part in the future, for now there is one simple puzzle to test things out. Currently, there are 2 days in the game, on the evening of the second day, the text output will stop and not continue, this means that this is the end of current content.

The engine is quite flexible and can be extended for easy modding, if there is going to be a demand for it.

Please share what you think about it, this is my first serious attempt at writing :) This is also my first attempt at pixel art, if you're an artist or a writer and you'd like to contribute, please do say. The game will also feature simple images to describe the environment in the terminal mode, but I need some time to cover all the locations.

MacOS note: due to peculiarities of OpenGL on Mac OS, the shaders will probably not work and the walking part will look too bright, this is a known problem. The MacOS version is untested and might not work at all.

Also note that currently, the game can only run on a 1280x1024 resolution (in a window), so a screen of at least this size is adviced.

Controls

In text mode, use number keys to select answers. Press 1 while the text is printing to show the whole thing at once. When asked to input text, input it with the keyboard.

In walking mode, use A and D to go left and right, and E to interact.
